duties_responsibilities.duty: Overseeing the development, implementation, and maintenance of systems and processes to transform the healthcare industry.
Defining and confirming technical requirements, guiding vendor application developers, and managing the development of complex program modules.
Maintaining uniform and current software engineering best practices, advising on development/IT concepts, and fostering creative problem-solving.
Managing technology projects efficiently and effectively by considering approach, integration, time, quality, and risks.
Providing IT operations support, developing operations capacity plans, and liaising with technology vendors.
Engaging with business and product teams to collaboratively develop technology roadmaps to position product portfolio for the future.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s or master’s degree in computer science, Engineering, or related field. Microsoft Azure, SAFe certifications are a plus.
